channel.title: How to make NRS3server work
channel.description:
Hey guys since everyone is bitching about fixing NRS3 I am just going to release.
IF YOU USE PLEASE BUMP
Working Client - http://up.ht/VK8zeS Working Source - http://uppit.com/sqml0jrarn0k/NRS3server_725_fixed.rar Working Cache - http://up.ht/VKdnAX
IF LINKS GO DOWN MESSAGE ME
How to make it work. 1. Download all files and extract to desktop 2. Place cache(folder) into server-data-* 3. Make sure you're portforwarded if you don't know how google it. 4. Change all ip's in loader.java which is located in client-src-Loader.java (3 IPS) 5. Compile everything 6. Run server in source 7. Run client and log in.
NOTE: You must download eclipse IDE if you wish to edit anything in the server. NOTE: This will work, if it doesn't then you have 0 intelligence whatsoever. NOTE: Give credit to TimeRS3 as I take no credit other than developing on his team for about a week. NOTE: Make sure to be careful when updating cache as you need opcodes, mapdata, etc. NOTE: If you require any further help my skype is in description. NOTE: To play the original server go to server advertisements and search NRS3server

item.title: How to make NRS3server work
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionxrsps Demolitionxrsps
item.description:
@Demolitionxrsps wrote:

Hey guys since everyone is bitching about fixing NRS3 I am just going to release.

IF YOU USE PLEASE BUMP

Working Client - http://up.ht/VK8zeS
Working Source - http://uppit.com/sqml0jrarn0k/NRS3server_725_fixed.rar
Working Cache - http://up.ht/VKdnAX

IF LINKS GO DOWN MESSAGE ME

How to make it work.

  1. Download all files and extract to desktop
  2. Place cache(folder) into server-data-*
  3. Make sure you’re portforwarded if you don’t know how google it.
  4. Change all ip’s in loader.java which is located in client-src-Loader.java (3 IPS)
  5. Compile everything
  6. Run server in source
  7. Run client and log in.

NOTE: You must download eclipse IDE if you wish to edit anything in the server.
NOTE: This will work, if it doesn’t then you have 0 intelligence whatsoever.
NOTE: Give credit to TimeRS3 as I take no credit other than developing on his team for about a week.
NOTE: Make sure to be careful when updating cache as you need opcodes, mapdata, etc.
NOTE: If you require any further help my skype is in description.
NOTE: To play the original server go to server advertisements and search NRS3server
